Name: Twin Bridges
Description: Two bridges across a medium size river at the centre of the battlefield. Mount a two-way offensive and flank the enemy.

Name: Twin Hills
Description: Two hills on grassland. Secure high ground for much-needed tactical advantage.

Name: Beach
Description: A relatively peaceful sandy beach with blue water. The red tide will wash away the beauty of this land.

Name: Great River
Description: Great river at the centre and only one bridge to cross. Swimming across may work too.

Name: Desert Plain
Description: An empty desert fill with nothing but grains of sand. The heat will be unbearable for most troops.

Name: Farmland
Description: It might not be a stretch to call this place a fruit of humanity. Surely a source of stability in any civilisation.

Name: Garden
Description: A huge circular garden made up of roads, rivers and a plethora of plants. An abundance of corpses will surely enrich the exceptional beauty of this place even further.

Name: Grassland
Description: A plain of grass as far as the eyes can see. Only fools would fight a losing battle in this place.

Name: King Of The Hill
Description: One hill in the middle. Only one force will be able to secure it and achieve domination on this battlefield.

Name: Jungle
Description: Fight in the middle of a jungle. Guerilla warfare will be the most suitable style of tactic here.

Name: Light Jungle
Description: Tropical land with covers of jungle spreading throughout the map. Two medium-sized rivers stretch throughout the map and will hinder troops' movement between jungles even more.

Name: Oasis
Description: Nature utopia in the middle of a hellish nightmare. Stay around the water area to maintain troops' temperature, but by doing so, they will suffer a movement penalty.

Name: Cross Rivers
Description: Four corners are divided by a cross of two rivers. No bridge in sight, so cross the rivers at your own risk.

Name: Lone Road
Description: A road leading to somewhere. Or nowhere.

Name: Slope
Description: A huge land slope. Secure the high ground first and prevent the enemies from catching up.

Name: Snow Plain
Description: Land of empty whiteness. Prepare for the cold or perish.

Name: Swamp
Description: Mixing the greens with the blues, swamp and marsh all over. What more can a man ever want from nature?

Name: Water Plain
Description: Blue shallow water stretch from north to south and east to west. The coolness of the water will surely cool down the heat of the battle to come.
